enum: Normal - tissue adjacent to primary tumour
Metastatic tumour - metastasis local to lymph node
Metastatic tumour - metastasis to distant location
Xenograft - derived from tumour cell line
Cell line - derived from xenograft tumour
Tumour - unknown if derived from primary or metastatic
Cell line – derived from metastatic tumour

Bissau Autonomous Region (also known as Bissau)

Lusaka Province (includes the capital city, Lusaka)
Sample has epidemiological link to Omicron Variant
Sample has epidemiological link to Variant of Concern (VoC)
Surveillance of international border crossing by air travel or ground transport
Surveillance of international border crossing by air travel
Surveillance of international border crossing by ground transport

anyOf.description: The percentage of the reference genome covered by the sequenced data, to a prescribed depth.
The average number of reads representing a given nucleotide in the reconstructed sequence.Provide value as a fold of coverage.
